chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Lady Caraline Damodred, p. 77 (75)—Cairhienin noble who made claim to the Sun Throne in Cairhien; she is related to Laman, the last king from House Damodred. She is in league with High Lord Darlin of Tear and Toram Riatin of Cairhien in opposition to Rand. See also Riatin, Toram; Sisnera, Darlin.
